chants.name: id
chants.description: unique id of a chant (also used in naming the gabc files)

chants.name: version
chants.description: Sometimes a chant exists in different versions. The versions currently used are “Vatican” and “Solesmes” according to the presence of rhythmic signs

chants.name: initial
chants.description: Whether to have a 1 or 2 lines initial or no initial at all

chants.name: mode
chants.description: Mode of the chant. Should be a number or “p” for the “Tonus Peregrinus”.

chants.name: mode_var
chants.description: This field contains more mode information; presumably the ending, as the GregoBase site writes: 'the “ending” field is used to put the ending according to Solesmes classification.'

chants.name: commentary
chants.description: Commentary that will be placed right above the chant in the PDF.

chants.name: gabc
chants.description: The GABC code of the chant.

chants.name: gabc_verses
chants.description: GABC of the other verses (same melody, different text)

chants.name: tex_verses
chants.description: LaTeX code of the other verses, where the place of melodic inflections are indicated in by bold and italic syllables.

chants.name: remarks
chants.description: Remarks about for example the transcription.

sources.name: year
sources.description: Year of publication (?) of the source

sources.name: caption
sources.description: Caption (usually with credits) shown above the source images.

sources.name: pages
sources.description: List of pages in the source

chant_sources.name: page_id
chant_sources.description: Page id. Can be a page number or e.g. `[125], 125**`

chant_sources.name: extent
chant_sources.description: The number of pages the chant spans.
